name: Countdown sign
description: To indicate that there is an exit about 100m

name: Countdown sign
description: To indicate that there is an exit about 200m

name: Countdown sign
description: To indicate that there is an exit about 300m

name: Cul-de-sac
description: To inform you that the road ahead ends

name: Cul-de-sac
description: To inform you that the road to the right ends

name: Cul-de-sac
description: To inform you that the road to the left

name: Right-of-way
description: To inform you that you have the right of way at the intersection ahead.

name: Park and ride
description: To inform you of the existence of a park-and-ride terminus that has a bus or train service

name: Information centre
description: To inform you of the existence of an information office or notice board

name: Co-ordinated traffic signals
description: To inform you that the traffic signals on this route are co-ordinated and that the signals will be green at all the subsequent intersections if you maintain the indicated speed

name: Multi-phase traffic signals
description: To point out that the signals at this intersection does not follow the normal sequence. At a normal intersection you would expect that the signal in your direction will change to green after the signal for cross traffic was yellow. At this intersection your signal may remain red whilst the signal in the opposite direction changes to green

name: Modal transfer
description: To show that there is a transport modal transfer point or terminus nearby where passengers may change their mode of transport
